name: .SNIBB
summary: Learn about .SNIBB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open SNIBB files with Snibbetracker in Windows and macOS. To open a SNIBB file, press the control + o keys.

Since SNIBB files are saved in plain text, you can also open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad and Apple TextEdit. However, incorrectly modifying SNIBB files with a text editor will break them, and they will not be playable in Snibbetracker.
Snibbetracker can convert SNIBB files to .WAV files. To do so, press the control + e keys.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .snibb file in Snibbetracker 1.1
images.caption: SNIBB file open in Snibbetracker 1.1
